Q_DESC:
Input a text txt[0..n-1] and a pattern pat[0..m-1], write a function search(char pat[], char txt[]) that prints all occurrences of pat[] and its permutations (or anagrams) in txt[]. You may assume that n > m. 
Expected time complexity is O(n)
TESTCASE_1:
BACDGABCDA
ABCD
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Found at Index 0
Found at Index 5
Found at Index 6
TESTCASE_2:
AAABABAA
AABA
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Found at Index 0
Found at Index 1
Found at Index 4
